dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. In upper right: "The Berlin Story: The American Broadcasting Company invites you to have this map in front of you during a one hour documentary program which will broadcast on Monday, January 10, 1949." Map shows Allied zones of occupation and  joint headquarters (Berlin) zone after World War II.
dct_publisher_sm: Chicago, Illinois : Rand McNally and Company, [1949].
